To assist you further, here are the basics: for us, it's not just about adhering to the letter of the law, but also about embracing the spirit and principles behind it to protect your data and your contract with us: We will hold you to the same standards in how you treat data that is collected on our systems - Our acceptable use policy ensures that if we believe you are mishandling user data, we will hold you accountable and may delete your account.
